queries.query:
from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "website_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "response_code")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dev-machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["website"] == "https://www.bing.com")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "website_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "response_code")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dev-machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["website"] == "https://www.google.com")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

charts.name: Last Hour - Connection and Response Time

queries.query:
from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "website_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "response_time" or r["_field"] == "connection_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "website_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dev-machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["website"] == "https://www.bing.com")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 7d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "website_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dev-machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["website"] == "https://www.google.com")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 7d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
